name: Desktop-geo-validations
tagline: Validations of geographical coordinates from files.
body:
# Introduction.
This app is util to check geospatial coordinates through txt files. For the moment this validation is only available for:
* Counties
* Marine Zones

# Project main structure
The app has the following files:
* client_config_areas.txt
* client_config_municipios.txt
* Validar.bat (Windows)
* Validar.sh (Linus/Mac)
and two folders:
* AreasMaritimas 
* Municipios

Each folder contains information about:
* input: There is the txt with the information to check.
* output: There is a txt with the checked information. 
* shapefile: There are multiple files that contains the geographic information.
* SHPMunicipioV.jar or SHPAreaMaritimaV.jar
 
**Note** 

 You can download: 
* Shapefile: [https://s3.amazonaws.com/IPT/shapes/LimitesMaritimos.zip](https://s3.amazonaws.com/IPT/shapes/LimitesMaritimos.zip) and [https://s3.amazonaws.com/IPT/shapes/Departamentos(2012).zip](https://s3.amazonaws.com/IPT/shapes/Departamentos(2012).zip)
* Java ARchive: [https://github.com/SIB-Colombia/desktop-geo-validations/tree/gh-pages/Java%20ARchive](https://github.com/SIB-Colombia/desktop-geo-validations/tree/gh-pages/Java%20ARchive)

# Structure of txt files
## Input txt
### For Marine Zone case:
The txt need to have the name "areaMaritimas.txt" and the following information in the same order:
* id 
* latitude
* longitude 
* Marine Zone name

### For Counties case:
The txt needs to have the name  "municipios.txt" and the following information in the same order:
* id 
* latitude
* longitude 
* County name
* Department name

## Output txt
### For Marine Zone case:
The txt shows the information in the following order:
* id 
* latitude
* longitude 
* Marine Zone name
* Marine Zone name calculated
* True or False (marine zone check)

### For Counties case:
The txt shows the information in the following order:
* id 
* latitude
* longitude 
* Department name
* Department name calculated
* True or False (department check)
* County name
* County name calculated
* True or False (county check)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
